Name: National Affiliation
Description: This field is used to indicate the association of the documented group to a nation, usually indicating its legal association.

Name: Founding Member
Description: This field is used to indicate founding members of the documented group.

Name: Member
Description: This field is used to indicate an member of the documented group.

Name: Member Role
Description: This field is used to indicate the type of role the member played in relation to the group.

Name: Member Start Date - Earliest
Description: This field is used to indicate the earliest known date of becoming an member of the documented group by the individual in question.

Name: Member Start Date - Latest
Description: This field is used to indicate the latest known date of becoming an member of the documented group by the individual in question.

Name: Member End Date - Earliest
Description: This field is used to indicate the earliest known date of ceasing to be an member of the documented group by the individual in question.

Name: Member End Date - Latest
Description: This field is used to indicate the latest known date of ceasing to be an member of the documented group by the individual in question.
